practice: Show that every basis is a minimal spanning set
Find a basis of the solution space of Ax = 0
CSIR-NET PYQ: Dimension of null space
Basis & Dimension.insights: Most students forget minimality. Basis = spanning + independent + minimal.

practice: Check whether a given set is a vector space
CSIR-NET PYQ: axioms of vector space
Vector Spaces.insights: Always verify all axioms. Most mistakes happen by skipping closure.
